osvSchema.details: There is an HTML injection vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS <=11.0 that may allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to craft a URL which, when clicked, could potentially generate a message that may entice an unsuspecting victim to visit an arbitrary website. This could simplify phishing attacks.

description_data.value:
** REJECT **
